snippet: ABRAMS--Herbert, M.D. Eminent radiologist, co-founder of Physicians for Social Responsibility, scholar of nuclear disarmament and human error, and to us, a devoted and generous uncle and great-uncle. We will miss you forever. Peter Lazes, Marie Rudden, Daniel Levy, Andrew Lazes, and Adrienne Lazes 1/3
lead_paragraph: ABRAMS--Herbert, M.D. Eminent radiologist, co-founder of Physicians for Social Responsibility, scholar of nuclear disarmament and human error, and to us, a devoted and generous uncle and great-uncle. We will miss you forever. Peter Lazes, Marie Rudden, Daniel Levy, Andrew Lazes, and Adrienne Lazes 1/3
